text: Scott Disick and Sofia Richie enjoyed another date night on Friday, 23 February while the model is also feeling extra love at home from two new family members. The 19 - year - old blond beauty shared photos of her new puppies, a cream longhaired dachshund and dapple dachshund, playing near a dog crate via an Instagram. Scott Disick and Sofia Richie Enjoy Date Night as She Introduces Second Puppy Source : eonline In the following day, Sofia was photographed with boyfriend Scott as they dressed casually while leaving the Shibuya sushi restaurant in Calabasas.
